posts.cooked:
I am looking to make some custom circuit boards for can distribution and wiring.  I would like to use similar Wago lever connectors to the ones on new version of the PDH .

Based on the description on the Rev website these are 2601 Series.  I have found some on Digikey that would likely work, but they all look like they have gray housings.

Wire to Board | Terminal Blocks | Electronic Components Distributor DigiKey

I would like to find some with housing colors similar to the PDH (green, yellow, red, black) does anyone know if these are available anywhere, or does Rev custom order those?

posts.name: Ryan Moore
posts.cooked:
When REV announced the V1.1 PDH Greg said that they were 2601, but the specific colors were special order.

img_4940_720 720√ó540 84.9 KB

img_4940_720 720√ó540 84.9 KB

img_4940_720 720√ó540 84.9 KB

Sidenote: in my pursuit of a personal circuit board design I found that Wago will send free samples (up to three per sku) for any of the  2601, 2606, and 2616 series connectors (the three different connectors on the PDH ).

image 1242√ó782 152 KB

image 1242√ó782 152 KB

image 1242√ó782 152 KB

posts.name: REV Robotics Co-founder & CEO
posts.cooked:
Adding on to this,  The custom color combinations for housings are all custom order, but also custom part numbers we had to generate for our devices.

You should have no problem buying grey ones, but unless you are doing a large production batch of something the colors are not really an option.

On the configuration side of things, like how many are stacked into a block, WAGO does this neat thing where you can reconfigure ones of the same series, so if you wanted 5 levers and they only sold a 4 or 8, you can remove or add multiples together.

WAGO knows that FIRST exists, and if you send in a message through their website asking them questions and mention FIRST , it will probably get to the right people.

Thanks for the feedback.  I suspected this might be the case, but I don‚Äôt play in the electronics component world very often, so I hoped I was missing a color configuration when rummaging through components.

posts.name: Dan_Karol
posts.cooked: Would there be any interest in selling the colored versions parts that Rev buys?

posts.name: REV Robotics Co-founder & CEO
posts.cooked: At the moment this would add significant complexity to our forecasting, inventory  and orders of these components that I am not sure we can manage at this time.
